title: Edinburgh, Scotland
description: I studied abroad at the University of Edinburgh for the fall semester in 2012. I studied in the School of Informatics and took courses on Algorithms & Data Structures and Logic Programming, as well as Sociology and East Asian Civilizations.

title: Kolkata, India
description: In the summer of 2013, I traveled to Kolkata, India for the Global Social Benefit Fellowship. I primarily worked in an IT training office in the semi-rural town of Metiabruz, pictured here.
